name: Takes a Village
description:
A little wizard has to save a village from endless horde of goblins and try to work together with the villagers to survive. 

Takes A Village is an action adventure game set in fantasy world where the player has to defeat the goblins with the help of the villagers by joining hands with them.. quite literally!

See how long you can survive before you succumb to the evil goblins. 

The concept of the game is for the wizard to go around collaborating with the villagers using them a literal weapon as they hold hands. the longer the game goes, the harder it gets and the enemies keep on getting stronger and the frequency increases.

The game is a work in progress but due to unforeseen circumstances couldn't be finished.
